original_text: Night and day we pray most earnestly that we may see you again and supply what is lacking in your faith.
korean_text: 주야로 심히 간구함은 너희 얼굴을 보고 너희 믿음이 부족한 것을 보충하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: that we may see you again
and supply what is lacking in your faith
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 믿음에 부족한 것을 공급하게 되기를
